phrases: Why not go talk to a girl?
No one wants to talk to me.
I would rather just take a nap here.
But I cannot say it yet.
I needed to do something to overwrite her death flag.
Akane, you should be more careful around
a perv who would kiss a defenseless girl.
If Souta-kun wants to be a perv,
he should have just said so!
You should not just brush people off, okay?
I cannot break her conquest flag, anyway.
It is the real Sou-kun, right?
Are they a couple, or something?!
Why is she on top of him?
I was worried about you this whole time!
I could not get a hold of you.
You are an only child, are not you?
I guess you do not remember, either.
I have known Sou-kun since we were kids!
Sou-kun transferred away in middle school,
and I have not seen him in two years!
Why are you in this class when you should be with the second-years?
Well, last year, I was studying overseas,
so I ended up a year behind.
I did not think he would transfer away while I was out sick!
Sou-kun, you look like you are warn out.
You can sleep on my lap and I will clean your ears.
You liked that, did not you?
I am sure that will make you feel better.
She is being too nice to him!
She is an older sister type!
This is where you are living?
You just feel terrible for Sou-kun, do not you?
You already knew he was living here.
Akane-chan, so you are crying for Sou-kun, too!
Sou-kun is spending time with other girls, and he kept them secret from me...
I mean, Akane-chan and Nanami-chan, you are both good girls.
I will take care of him with Nanami-chan!
I am actually happy the two of them are getting along.
Do not sacrifice me for their friendship!
I will make sure both of them stay good friends with you!
I cannot believe I let Souta-kun become lonely!
I am a failure of a friend!
If we stay like this, we can all be friends!
So what are we going to do?
Is this some kind of dark art?!
Souta, does Kikuno have a flag, too?
That is the sibling love flag.
So that is what makes her act like this.
You told me not to break them this morning.
You are going to end up being treated like
a little brother your entire life at this rate!
Is there a problem with that?
You like being a little brother that much?!
That should be enough for you!
You should let me in on it, too.
I am not a kid anymore.
You are just embarrassed because other girls are here.
It does not seem to have been effective!
It is said that she is been here since before the school was founded.
But why... are not you wearing a skirt?
You do not know how to wear Japanese clothes properly?
Everyone is forgetting tradition because of the West.
Anyway, can we do something about this, granny?
That building was constructed when the school was founded.
It is going to take some significant work to clean up.
The Japanese population is dropping, and we do not have a large budget
getting the place rebuilt is a tall order.
Young'uns these days rely on others far too much!
You should try to do something on your
I think that is enough nonsense for one day, granny!
Do not come in here with shoes on, either.
so you already had something in mind, right?
I am the student council president you can depend on.
It will be faster to just rebuild the whole thing.
I have already called in the professionals.
Why does the school even have an organization like that?!
I can see you wrecked another place.
It was not me this time!
How long will it take for you to fix this place up so he can live here?
I would like you to do something as soon as possible for Sou-kun here.
It is going to take a month to do all of this.
That might be different if we could get some more people on the project.
You are living in this place?
If we would only known sooner...
I asked the class to help.
This will be more than enough.
We are doing this in a week!
I would like to thank you all for listening to my request.
I guess I owe you all...
It is all thanks to all of you, Akane, Okiku-nee.
It is all thanks to you, Akane.
You have got a wonderful smile!
Just seeing it makes me so happy!
You are like a cake made out of bliss itself.
Everyone is doing it out of their hearts.
You do not return goodwill with goodwill.
You keep it in your heart.
It will grow inside you, and change you,
and then one day you will grow into
a person that can have goodwill towards others.
It is like a whole different place.
You did not do a single thing, though.
We only have finishing touches left to make,
so feel free to start moving in.
Time to finish this bad boy up!
I cannot get this by myself.
Sorry, could you help me here?
I need a man to help me here.
Uh, I am sorry if I was wrong.
People always treat me like a girl.
This is the first time someone thought I was a guy the first time we talked!
You can call me Megumu, Souta-kun!
You can tell men are friends when they call each other by name.
me Megu like I am a girl.
So, what is up with that uniform, Megumu?
Onee-chan said I look a lot cuter this way,
and got approval from the school to have me dress this way...
Your sister must be a tough cookie.
You are the only one who understands!
Why do you smell so good?
Souta-kun, do you need some help
What are you going on about?!
I always help couples find new partners!
Then you are not helping at all!
I wish I could do that.
Men and women can be great friends!
That is why I never saw Megu-chan with the girls in PE.
But everyone still calls me Megu...
I take my eyes off of you for a second,
and you are already with another girl.
Look he is wearing a men's uniform!
Sorry, but Megu-chan's always in the girls' bathroom.
When I go to the men's bathroom, everyone always gets uncomfortable.
So the girls are okay with me using the girls' bathroom.
So this is where you have been, Souta.
You could not find another guy?
Hatate is the only one in this dorm, right?
According to the rules, any dorm with a single resident will be shut down.
Take away our careless student council president!
You need to have at least five people!
but I am sure you will get five friends together in a hurry.
Even if you do not have any friends, you do have an oneechan.
I am used to being alone.
This is a men's dorm, is not it?
No need to worry about formalities.
Yeah, but there cannot just be two of us there...
We are the opposite sex, and all.
I will move in here, then.
I-I want to move in too.
Now we only need one more.
I do not know any men...
Hey, it is just a joke, Nanami-chan.
Sou-kun's good friends with you, Nanami.
I never said I wanted to live here!
If I do not get that corner room,
Well, I guess... it will be fun.
I said it will be fun,
but why are we all gathering in my room?
We all suddenly decided to move in, so you are the only one with any stuff.
Then you did not have to move in today.
we leave you alone for even a second.
It is true I am alone in the world, but...
It is my first time in a room of a male friend.
It feels more like you have entered your boyfriend's room, not your friend's.
If we are all going to live together,
then we need to decide a bunch of things.
Like who is going to be in charge, or who is on duty for what.
You have sure thought this through, Okiku-nee.
I am the oneechan, after all!
But before that we need to take a bath.
Yeah, but I wanted to get in with Sou-kun,
You mean a really long time ago,
If you are jealous, you can go ahead and call me oneechan.
Did you finally fall for him, Nanami-chan?!
You finally stopped being that weird tsundere?
What is that even supposed to mean?!
Akane-chan, are you rooting for Sou-kun and Nanami-chan?
Akane-chan, you are a nice girl.
You are a member of the Make Sou-kun happy alliance.
What do members of that do?
They watch Sou-kun be happy and feel good.
Are not we supposed to be the ones making him happy?!
Akane cannot keep up with her craziness.
I need to get a conversation going with Megumu.
Souta-kun, we are going to look in the bath.
We are going to go, walk straight in, and get an eyeful.
I am pretty sure that real men would not look.
I thought I would be able to put up a better fight.
If possible, you should get rid of him first.
You need the knight for protection.
He will always follow the Royal Banner.
The bishop acts as a decoy, and the ninja attacks from behind.
So that is what I should have done.
Oniisan, you have not forgotten your promise, have you?
The person who loses will listen to whatever the winner says.
I wonder you are going to tell me to do.
I am not going to tell you to do anything.
I want to ask you for something.
I did not win because I was good.
Above my head I have the victor flag,
and above yours, you have the defeat flag.
I will give you my power.
you must learn the ultimate truth of this world.
I wonder what answer you will give when you find it...
The ultimate truth of this world...
So we are having our athletic meet and I do not even remember having much class.
I am going to find the best place to film, for Sou-kun!
Now you are acting more like a dad instead of an older sister!
We are all going to get together and cheer for Souta-kun.
Akane-chan is going to get me a great outfit that showcases just how manly I am.
Leave it to Me, There is a 99.9 Chance We are Going to Win This Athletic Meet
I hope you watch us next time!
